members.name: John Smith
members.title: Senior Partner
members.bio: John Smith is the founding partner with over 25 years of experience in Hong Kong law. He specializes in complex commercial litigation and has represented numerous Fortune 500 companies.

members.name: Sarah Chen
members.title: Partner - Family Law
members.bio: Sarah Chen leads our family law practice with expertise in high-net-worth divorces and international custody disputes.
specialties: In High-Net-Worth Divorces And International Custody Disputes

members.name: Michael Wong
members.title: Associate
members.bio: Michael Wong focuses on corporate law and cross-border transactions.
specialties: Es On Corporate Law And Cross-Border Transactions
